content: fingering weight yarn mohawk style socks by viola bauer sport weight yarn heel with step joint see dart 1/10 mohawk style v0 8 sole cuff and front pattern toe heel clockwise from top left 2/10 mohawk style v0 8 i have been dreaming for a long time of socks in a punk style with a „mohawk at the back leg the dreams grew when i got more than 1 kg of sock yarn scraps as a present in january 2024 i didn t find any patterns to follow this idea so it was time to try it myself i didn`t want to have knots at the back leg so i used what i learned while bobbin lacemaking in the last years the colours i chose for the first try spoke clearly this would be a clean style inspired by native american craftsmanship and arts i think it looks best with coloured yarns i spontaneously worked the socks as kind of non-skid socks this pattern is also a big „thank you to the moderators and fellows of sock madness i had so much fun and learned so much so easily last year when i participated for the first time enjoy materials needles 5 dpns us 1 5 2 5 mm or size needed to get gauge additionally one circular needle or 2 longer dpns for the heel 15 cm / 6 in may be too short better use 20 cm / 8 in or 3 circular needles + 4 markers you need the markers to simulate the needle changes yarn fingering weight yarn a total of 100-120 g about half assorted dark scraps c1 the other half light scraps c2 for the leg a length of 120 cm 50 in for each scrap will suffice for heel and foot at least 15-20 g each preferably selfstriping or variegated yarn a sockblocker you may use a cable needle but it may be easier and faster as i explain it in the pattern size and gauge size s 48 st foot and leg circumference 17 cm / 7 inches size m 60 st foot and leg circumference 23 cm / 9 in 15x front pattern = 10 cm/ 4 in size l 72 st foot and leg circumference 29 cm / 12 in fingering weight yarn 400 m / 440 yd per 100 g 10 cm x 10 cm 4 in x 4 in 44 round x 29 st the socks can be made in any stitch count that is a multiple of 4 the fit is comparable to vanilla socks you can make socks in size m with sport weight yarn ca 375-420 m / 440 yd per 150 g 10cm x 10cm 4 in x 4 in 36 round x 24 st using the instructions of size s abbreviations k - knit p - purl yo - yarnover st/sts stitch/stitches k2tog - knit two together right-leaning decrease ssk - slip 2 stitches individually as if to knit then knit them together
